name: tsd-check-runtime
description: TypeScript type declaration verification library. It's like tsd-check but works at runtime, actually compiling the code

scripts.test: npm run test-run && npm run test-standalone && npm run sample-project
scripts.sample-project: cd sample-project && ([ -d node_modules ] || npm i]) && npm run all
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma all --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --no-bracket-spacing  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/types.ts src/checkType.ts src/expectType.ts --theme markdown --out api --ignoreCompilerErrors --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
